steps.text: Start the engine and allow it to idle.

Depress the accelerator pedal quickly down to the
limit stop and immediately release it again. The measurement should
not take longer than half a second.

Download Setup file (the Tech 32 uses only Setup
files, no reference curves).
Start engine and allow it to idle.

Depress the accelerator pedal quickly down to the
limit stop and immediately release it again. The measurement should
not take longer than half a second.
